short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offline Goal based portfolio manager. Import mutual funds from Zerodha Coin with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PotMyFund lets you classify your investments in to different pots (investment goals). You can also set a goal amount and time period to achieve it. The extension lets you manage & analyse your pots as well as Mutual funds portfolio.

It works offline, your data is not uploaded to any server. Your data is encrypted and stored on your own device.You can export (encrypted exports) and import data anytime.

It supports importing portfolio from Zerodha Coin platform with a single click. Support for other platforms like Groww, ICICI Direct, Paytm money, Kuvera will be added soon. In coming future you will also be able to add funds using CAMS statements and manually via entering it.
